name: box-node-cognito-create-appuser-lambda-sample
description: This lambda creates the user in Box as a Post Authorization of the user's first login. It updates the box_appuser_id in Cognito user

scripts.zip: zip -rMM box-node-cognito-create-appuser-lambda-sample index.js cognito-manager.js box-manager.js aws-service.js private_key.pem node_modules

author: Box <oss@box.com>
